definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: A large tiger named Pasha roams the garden.
sentences.chinese: 一個名爲大老虎帕夏漫遊花園。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, General Kayani named General Ahmed Shujaa Pasha as the new ISI chief.
sentences.chinese: 星期二，基亞尼任命帕夏將軍爲三軍情報局局長。

definition: Suleiman (name)/General Michel Suleiman (1948-), Lebanese military man and politician, president of Lebanon 2008-2014
Husain or Hussein (name)/Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura/Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003
(loanword) caliph/also written 哈利發|哈利发[ha1 li4 fa1]
Bokhara or Bukhara city in Uzbekistan
Mohammed (c. 570-632), central figure of Islam and prophet of God
Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
